response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, reflecting over $8,000 in development costs, materials, and expertise. Considering its unique features and the quality it embodies, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000, which I hope will make this opportunity even more appealing. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 12000}
